name: Quarantine at Home
description:
Quarantine at Home

This game is about when I got COVID-19.

In my country, I had to quarantine for a week.

I was so depressed and bored during the quarantine.

Simple clicker game.

Game Play

Click to get exp and spend time.

You can level up when exp is fully charged.

The activity makes you spend time faster.

ESC key to pause and return to the menu or exit the game

Credit List

- Work out
